id: stories/site/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly #1: {apiKey=apikeys, keyWord=adele, zipCode=90015, city=York, attractionId=333444, venueId=222111, promoterId=9999, source=ticketmaster, countryCode=Canada, classificationName=movies, eventCount=50}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page

And change all possible fields on the Event Discovery Widget page:
［|apiKey |keyWord|zipCode|city|attractionId|venueId|promoterId|source      |countryCode|classificationName|eventCount|
|apikeys|adele  |90015  |York|333444      |222111 |9999      |ticketmaster|Canada     |movies            |50        |］
And store all fields values on the Event Discovery Widget page
Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
Check that popup embedded code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored values on the Event Discovery Widget page
Check that embedded html code contains stored values

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly
